overview: From America's deep South, to Detroit and New York this captivating and enlightening documentary special traces the evolution of blues through pivotal moments in American history. Brewer discovers that there was no music called 'the blues' when its creators just stepped into a new feel of musical expressionismâ€¦ just a means of releasing a lifetime of pain and oppression, from which music, momentarily, set them free.
title: Monochrome: Black, White & Blue
